text: Sorry, there is no more time for questions.
Sorry, maybe it is better if you discuss this at the coffee break.
Sorry, maybe you can discuss this during the coffee break.
Sorry, maybe you can discuss this later.
Thank you again for your interesting presentation.
I have one question. What's the next step?
No questions at all? Don't be shy.
I have one question. What is your next challenge?
Thanks for the presentation.
Thanks again.
This session is over.
This was the last presentation for this session.
This was the last presentation for today. Thanks again to all the speakers for their interesting presentations.
You may enjoy now the coffee break.
It's lunchtime now.
Time to head to the welcome party.
Time to head to the farewell party.
See you at the banquet.
See you back in 1 hour.
See you back in 30 minutes.
Apparently we have some technical problems.
Can anybody help the speaker?
I said there is no more time.
We are a bit late on the schedule. Sorry for the inconvenience.
We are perfectly on schedule. Thanks for the cooperation.
I would like to invite on stage the organisers of the conference.
I would like to invite on stage my co-chair.
